About Me

I am currently a 2-nd year Ph.D. student in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at Texas A&M University. I am working at the DATA Lab under the supervision of Prof. Xia (Ben) Hu. My research interests lie in the general area of data mining and machine learning.
